movies.title: Imagine I'm Beautiful
movies.plot: After her mother's suicide, a young woman moves to New York to start afresh. After a rocky start with her new and troubled roommate, the two slowly forge a friendship, finding solace in each other's difficult pasts; until one of them makes a discovery that will alter their friendship for good.
movies.simplePlot: After her mother's suicide, a young woman moves to New York to start afresh. After a rocky start with her new and troubled roommate, the two slowly forge a friendship, finding solace in ...

biography.bio: Naomi McDougall Jones is an award-winning writer, actress, producer, and women in film activist based in Brooklyn, NY. Her first feature film, Imagine I'm Beautiful, won 12 awards on the film festival circuit before being picked up for theatrical and digital distribution by Candy Factory Films.
biography.name: Naomi McDougall Jones

biography.bio: Katie Morrison is an actress, known for Imagine I'm Beautiful (2014), Ovum (2015) and Donny! (2015).
biography.name: Katie Morrison

biography.bio: John Patryn was born in Poland as Jan Kutrzeba. His family emigrated Finland when he was only five years old. He started performing at a very early age, playing the piano, the accordion, and as a drummer for high school bands. He later also toured with a band as their alto saxophonist, driver and manager. After first studying international business, and working many odd jobs from cab driving to finance, from construction to advertising, he finally went into acting. Prior to working in the U.S., he lived in five different countries. He has been based in New York City since 2010 working mostly in television and film. In 2015 John wrote and directed the single shot short film Wszystko Bedzie Fanie, which will be screening at the Cannes 2016 film festival short film corner. He continues to write and direct under his birth name Jan Kutrzeba.
biography.name: Jan Kutrzeba

biography.bio: Lucas Salvagno is an actor, known for Imagine I'm Beautiful (2014), God Don't Make the Laws (2011) and The Showing (2014).
biography.name: Lucas Salvagno

biography.bio: Susan Wands is an actress, known for Loving (1983), Imagine I'm Beautiful (2014) and Come Home Raquel (2011).
biography.name: Susan Wands

biography.bio: Natalie Knepp grew up In Aurora, Ohio. At the age of five she followed in her Mother's footsteps and began playing the Harp. With a love for music and the arts, she found a home in the theatre at the age of twelve, when she played Gloria in 'Wait until Dark' at the Aurora Community Theatre in Ohio. After her sophomore year in high school, she signed with Ford Modeling and Talent Agency during her acclaimed performance as Juliet in 'Romeo & Juliet' at the Weathervane Playhouse in Akron, Ohio. After her Junior year of High School, she was awarded a scholarship to the esteemed Interlochen Arts Academy in Michigan, where she graduated with a major in Theatre and a minor in Harp. She continued her studies at Rutgers University, Mason Gross School of the Arts, where she graduated with a B.F.A in Acting and spent a year of study and performance at Shakespeare's Globe Theatre in London. She resides in NYC working in Television, Film, and as a voice-over artist for many national campaigns.
biography.name: Natalie Knepp

biography.bio: Matthew Addison is an actor, known for Meme (2017), Imagine I'm Beautiful (2014) and Sleepwalkers (2016).
biography.name: Matthew Addison

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Lyon Hamill yet.
biography.name: Lyon Hamill

biography.bio: David Ilku first appeared in various performances in New York City night clubs. Sharing the stage with the likes of The Beastie Boys and Madonna, he soon got noticed. David has worked in theater projects with the New York Theater Workshop, Drama Dept., and the Culture Project, among others. His film credits include Full Grown Men (2006) (which he co-produced), Risk (1988), Blue Steel (1990), Godass (2000), Night Journey (1996) and Liquid Sky (1982). He also co-wrote and performed with Jennifer Tilly in the short film "Salvation for Giorgio Armani (1984)". His TV credits include Spin City (1996), The Cosby Show (1984) and Comedy Central's Premium Blend (1997). David writes and performs his highly acclaimed brand of comedy around the country and the world and is one-third of the comedy trio Unitard and one-half of the comedy duo The Duelling Bankheads. He is also writing and recording music and was an Island Records recording artist in the band, World at a Glance.
biography.name: David Ilku

biography.bio: Bob Jaffe is an actor and producer, known for Underdog (2007), Water Dogs (2014) and The High Priestess (2015).
biography.name: Bob Jaffe

biography.bio: Nicola Quinn is an actress, known for Imagine I'm Beautiful (2014) and The Back Up Singer (2015).
biography.name: Nicola Quinn

biography.bio: Born and raised in a musical family in Pueblo, Colorado, Cynthia moved to NY to attend the Manhattan School of Music and received her Masters of Music in Piano performance. After teaching and performing the piano, professionally singing and musical directing she discovered her love of act at The T. Schreiber Studios, studying with Terry Schreiber. Her recent film work has been presented at The Film Society of Lincoln Center, The Soho International Film Festival, World-Fest International Film Festival, Indie-Fest and has won awards in the The LA Movie Awards, The Big Apple Film Festival, Manhattan Film Festival, Trenton Film Society's Not Quite Legal Festival, Buffalo Screams and the NY Filmmaker's Festival. Her episode of the web series, "Brooklyn is in Love" won two awards at the prestigious LA Webfest. Stage work includes performances in many Off-Broadway theaters in New York City including The Barrow Group, T. Schreiber Studios, The Wild Project, The Articulate and The Secret Theaters. As a singer she has sung back-up vocals for both Paul McCartney at Carnegie Hall and Bjork at Riverside Church and she sang with the New York Philharmonic when they won three Grammy Awards in Classical Music for John Adams' "On the Transmigration of Souls." Her singing has been featured on the New York Times website and as a pianist she has performed with The New York Revels on Garrison Keillor's "A Prairie Home Companion" at New York's Town Hall and on NPR.
biography.name: Cynthia Shaw

biography.bio: Gwenevere Sisco is an actress, known for Don't Open Me (2017), Imagine I'm Beautiful (2014) and Heart & Soul (2010).
biography.name: Gwenevere Sisco

biography.bio: Alexandra Turshen is an actress and director, known for Boy Meets Girl (2014), Red Oaks (2014) and Body (2015).
biography.name: Alexandra Turshen

biography.bio: Katherine Wessling is an actress, known for Tear (2008), The Job (2011) and Imagine I'm Beautiful (2014).
biography.name: Katherine Wessling
